transArray.content: This is my first time choosing Hanting and I am very satisfied! The room is clean, the breakfast is very good, and the staff's service attitude is also very good. In addition, there is a large park next to the hotel, which is great for walking. If the location is acceptable, everything is great!
Hello, dear family, you emerge from all things and are filled with the soul of a little man. I want to leave a lasting mark in your life. I love you, little man.
